de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.geometry

Class SweepHullDelaunay2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.geometry.SweepHullDelaunay2D

  • @Reference(authors="David Sinclair",
           title="S-hull: a fast sweep-hull routine for Delaunay triangulation",
           booktitle="Online: http://s-hull.org/")
public class SweepHullDelaunay2D
extends Object
    Compute the Convex Hull and/or Delaunay Triangulation, using the sweep-hull approach of David Sinclair. Note: This implementation does not check or handle duplicate points! TODO: Handle duplicates. TODO: optimize data structures for memory usage
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      Class representing a triangle, by referencing points in a list.

        Flip a single triangle, if necessary.
        Parameters:

        flipped - Bitset to modify
        Returns:
        number of other triangle, or -1

      • getHull

        public Polygon getHull()
        Get the convex hull only. Note: if you also want the Delaunay Triangulation, you should get that first!
        Returns:
        Convex hull
